headline: Trump Invokes ‘Golden Share’ to Keep Steel Mill Running. What It May Mean for These Stocks.
summary: The Wall Street Journal reports that President Donald Trump invoked his ‘golden share’ to keep U.S. Steel’s Granite City steel mill in Illinois running.

raw.headline: Trump Invokes ‘Golden Share’ to Keep Steel Mill Running. What It May Mean for These Stocks.
raw.summary: The Wall Street Journal reports that President Donald Trump invoked his ‘golden share’ to keep U.S. Steel’s Granite City steel mill in Illinois running.

headline: Nucor (NUE) Is Down 5.7% After Lower Q3 Guidance Highlights Margin and Volume Pressures
summary: Nucor Corporation recently issued third-quarter 2025 earnings guidance, forecasting earnings of US$2.05 to US$2.15 per diluted share, below the prior quarter’s reported earnings of US$2.60 per share. This guidance reflects anticipated declines across all of Nucor’s operating segments, with particular pressure from lower steel mill volumes, margin compression, and higher costs in the steel products division. With weaker volumes and compressed margins influencing the latest outlook, we’ll...
